text: Baba nobugogotya kuni, zekuthi kwakufika ukoyika, nibabone bejonga kuni, Amehlo abo agungquze okomntu owonganyelwe kukufa. Kuze kuthi kusakumka ukoyika, banixabele ngamalwimi abo abukhali, benobugqolo mayela (nokuxhasa) okulungileyo. Abo Abakholwanga, ngoko ke uAllâh wenze imisebenzi yabo ayabi nto yanto. Yaye kulula oko kuAllâh
